Notes:
**🚀 Features**
- Introduced a new design overhaul via PR #11, enhancing the overall UI experience.
- Added automatic theme selection from system settings when no custom theme is defined.
- Applied the selected theme to web dialogs for consistent styling across the application.
- Extended theming support to image previews, ensuring visual consistency.
- Updated detail text and file form themes to align with the new design guidelines.

**🐞 Bug Fixes**
- Resolved owner-related issues that were causing incorrect behavior or data inconsistencies.

**🛠️ Maintenance & Refactoring**
- *(No maintenance or refactoring changes identified in this release.)*
